org.kaaproject.kaa.common.channels.protocols.kaatcp.messages

Class MqttFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kaaproject.kaa.common.channels.protocols.kaatcp.messages.MqttFrame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConnAck, Connect, Disconnect, KaaSync, PingRequest, PingResponse

    public abstract class MqttFrame
extends Object
    Basic Mqtt message. Fixed header format bit 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 0 byte 1 Message Type Dup flag QoS level RETAIN byte 2 Remaining length
    Author:
    Andrey Panasenko

      • isNeedCloseConnection

        public abstract boolean isNeedCloseConnection()
        Check if this Mqtt frame should be last frame on connection and connection should be closed.
        Returns:
        boolean 'true' if connection should be closed after frame transmition.

      • decodeComplete

        public boolean decodeComplete()
        Test if Mqtt frame decode complete.
        Returns:
        boolean 'true' if decode complete

      • upgradeFrame

        public MqttFrame upgradeFrame()
                       throws KaaTcpProtocolException
        Used in case if Frame Class should be changed during frame decode, Used for migrate from KaaSync() general frame to specific classes like Sync, Bootstrap. Default implementation is to return this.
        Returns:
        new MqttFrame as specific class.
        Throws:
        KaaTcpProtocolException - the kaa tcp protocol exception
